name: Embassy Suites Hotel Chicago - Lombard / Oak Brook

reviews.text: I was a little nervous booking this location after some of the bad reviews I read. However, the other websites I look at had favorable reviews. When we were looking to book, everything in Chicago was expensive, but this hotel was at least towards the lower end of the expensive rates. With the free parking and breakfast, we decided to give it a try.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

description: The Embassy Suites Chicago Lombard/ Oak Brook hotel is located across the street from Yorktown Mall the Shops at Butterfield and just 2 miles from the prestigious Oakbrook Center Mall. Morton Arboretum and the Brookfield Zoo are other local attractions just minutes from this Oak Brook hotel. Our all-suite, full-service, upscale accommodations provide a comfortable and relaxing environment with the very best in customer service. An ideal choice for the business or leisure traveler! Guests of the stay in a spacious two-room suite complete with a refrigerator, microwave oven and flexible work/dining space.
